about.title: Experience in Tech Industry
about.summary: I'm a Full Stack Web Developer from Henry BootCamps and Bachelor's in Business Engineering from Peruvian Private Northern University (UPN). I have experience developing web applications that are responsive and scalable. Im skilled in frameworks like React for FrontEnd and Express & Nest in BackEnd. I've built several projects on my portfolio using React, Express and Nest, where I can show my habilities building responsive web sites and secure backEnd servers. My last project as a freelancer was EcowashWeb, a static site for a carwash local business. I'm a very proactive person, I'm always working on a project and pushing changes to my gitHub.

experience.name: Freelancer
experience.summary: I'm selling web development services for local businesses of my city, my last client was a local Carwash.

experience.name: Delaware North (TD Garden)

experience.name: Delaware North (TD Garden)

education.title: FullStack Developer
education.summary: Knowledge developing web applications that are responsive and scalable. My english has allowed me to improve my skills, accessing information that its not in spanish, helped me improving my teamwork, also, allow my applications to support business processes with ease. I am a very proactive person who's always taking new goals in order to improve my capabilities. I have some projects where I've worked in UX / UI design, front-End & back-End. Please feel free to check them.

education.title: Business Engineering
education.summary: Bachelor at Business School. Business Engineer title is currently in process. Proficient knowledge on business management areas and workflows. Experience creating and developing supply chains, logistics procedures, inventory management, and human resources management & recruiting. Specialized on process management and business cases problem solving.
